SELECT count(*) from prepare_goods_records where (process_user_id in (SELECT customer_id from customer_agent_relations where types=2 and agent_id=#{agents_id}) OR process_user_id=(SELECT customer_id from agents WHERE id=#{agents_id}))
and created_at > str_to_date(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and created_at < str_to_date(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and agent_id=#{son_agents_id}

SELECT pgr.id,a.company_name ,DATE_FORMAT(pgr.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') created_at, pgr.quantity,pgr.terminal_list ,c.name as creator from prepare_goods_records pgr LEFT JOIN agents a on a.id=pgr.agent_id LEFT JOIN customers c on c.id=pgr.process_user_id where pgr.id=#{id}
SELECT id,company_name from agents where parent_id=#{agents_id} and status=2

SELECT DISTINCT g.id,IFNULL(agn.name,g.title) as goodname from terminals t LEFT JOIN goods g on t.good_id=g.id LEFT JOIN agent_good_names agn on g.id=agn.good_id where t.agent_id=#{agents_id} and t.customer_id is null
SELECT DISTINCT pc.id,pc.name as paychannel from terminals t LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc on pc.id=t.pay_channel_id where t.agent_id=#{agents_id} and t.customer_id is null
SELECT count(t.serial_num) FROM terminals t WHERE t.agent_id = #{agents_id} and t.serial_num=#{serial_num}
SELECT count(t.serial_num) FROM terminals t WHERE t.agent_id = #{agents_id} AND t.customer_id IS NULL and t.serial_num=#{serial_num}
